General Macros


Defines

#define PMATH_OS_UNIX
 If defined, the operating system is a unix like system (Linux, Solaris, BSD).
#define PMATH_OS_WIN32
 If defined, the operating system is Microsoft Windows.
#define PMATH_AMD64
 If defined, the processor is compatible to an AMD64.
#define PMATH_X86
 If defined, the processor is compatible to an Intel x86.
#define PMATH_SPARC64
 If defined, the processor is compatible to a SPARC in 64 bit mode (UltraSPARC).
#define PMATH_SPARC32
 If defined, the processor is compatible to a SPARC in 32 bit mode.
#define PMATH_BYTE_ORDER
 The processors byte ordering: 1 for big endian and -1 for little endian.
#define PMATH_64BIT
 If defined, the machine runs a 64 bit instruction set. Implies PMATH_BITSIZE == 64.
#define PMATH_32BIT
 If defined, the machine runs a 64 bit instruction set. Implies PMATH_BITSIZE == 32.
#define PMATH_BITSIZE
 The machines word size in bits.
Generated on Sun Oct 11 15:13:17 2009 for pMath by  1.5.9
